name: Florian

projects.name: Ava AI Assistant
projects.description: Mobile-friendly web chatbot built with FastAPI and GPT-4o, designed to represent me to recruiters. Includes custom memory and dynamic Q&A using OpenAI API.

projects.name: Blackjack Online Game
projects.description: Browser-based Blackjack game where players face off against the dealer, featuring score tracking and Supabase integration for persistent stats. Designed like a full-stack SaaS product. No signup needed â€” just play instantly, track your stats, and enjoy a polished, ad-free experience. Built with React, Vite, and Supabase, the app features full CRUD functionality for persistent player stats. Architecture is clean, scalable, and ready for future multiplayer expansion.

projects.name: BuddyBot
projects.description: Autonomous Minecraft companion bot powered by OpenAI, using Mineflayer for in-game automation. Built to simulate a believable player assistant.
